last_episode_to_air.name: The End of War between Crown Prince and Vice-Premier
last_episode_to_air.overview: Cha-eon leaves behind his final wish. Moved by the king's hopes and Je-yun's plan, Yul makes good on his promise to I-seo.

name: 100 Days My Prince
overview: Lee Yool falls off a cliff and nearly dies in an attempted assassination. He loses his memory, and wanders for 100 days under a new name and personality. During this period, he meets Hong Sim, head of the first detective agency in Joseon.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A prince is the victim of an attempted assassination. He falls off a cliff and subsequently wanders for 100 days under a new name and personality. During that time he meets the head of a prominent detective agency.

episodes.name: Today Is Your Only Chance to Cry
episodes.overview: Lee Yul begins a secret investigation after growing suspicious of his worsening health. Yeon Hong-sim returns to Hanyang in search of her brother.

episodes.name: Crown Prince in Great Agony
episodes.overview: Yul uncovers the mastermind's identity and Kim So-hye's secret before coming under attack in the forest. Hong-sim is punished for refusing to wed.

episodes.name: Your Name Is Won Deuk
episodes.overview: Yul loses all memory, but gains a new identity as Na Won-deuk. Hong-sim begrudgingly chooses to become a wife to avoid life as a concubine.

episodes.name: The Newlywed Couple in Debt
episodes.overview: Jung Je-yun searches for a link between the royal physician's murder and Yul's disappearance. Hong-sim puts Won-deuk to work to repay his debt.

episodes.name: Do You Not Consider Me Your Daughter Anymore?
episodes.overview: News of the crown prince's passing is made public. Hong-sim is delighted to learn of Won-deuk's ability to read and write.

episodes.name: Do You Know How Much I Missed You?
episodes.overview: Hong-sim's reunion with her brother doesn't go as expected. Eunuch Yang notices something off about the crown prince's dead body.

episodes.name: Stay with Me
episodes.overview: Witnessing Won-deuk's martial arts skills, Hong-sim gets curious about his real identity. News of the queen's talisman sparks protest and debate.

episodes.name: You Are Not Won Deuk
episodes.overview: Won-deuk celebrates an unforgettable birthday. Mu-yeon completes his final task for Kim Cha-eon and prepares to leave with Hong-sim.

episodes.name: Everything I Told about You Is Not True
episodes.overview: Je-yun reunites with Hong-sim as the new county governor. To recover his memory, Won-deuk visits Hanyang and enters palace walls.

episodes.name: They Say His Highness Is Alive
episodes.overview: With Hong-sim and Won-deuk's help, Je-yun concocts a plan to get in Park Seon-do's good graces. Rumors swirl about the crown prince being alive.

episodes.name: Vice-Premier Kim Is Missing
episodes.overview: The king tries to regain control of his throne. Hong-sim and Won-deuk settle their affairs prior to leaving. Je-yun sees Yul in Won-deok.

episodes.name: The Return of the Crown Prince
episodes.overview: Cha-eon interrupts the coronation ceremony with a shocking announcement. Yul has trouble moving on from his memories with Hong-sim.

episodes.name: Demand from Ming’s Envoy
episodes.overview: Hong-sim searches for Mu-yeon in Hanyang with her father and Je-yun in tow. Yul's competency is tested by a visiting envoy.

episodes.name: We Must Solve the Riddle
episodes.overview: Won-deuk and Hong-sim reconnect as Yul and Yoon I-seo. Je-yun assists Yul in his quest to find his diary — and answers.

episodes.name: Evidence of Vice-Premier’s Evil Deeds
episodes.overview: Having regained his memory, Yul seeks revenge on a killer in his midst. Cha-eon plans bloodshed to achieve his goals.

episodes.name: The End of War between Crown Prince and Vice-Premier
episodes.overview: Cha-eon leaves behind his final wish. Moved by the king's hopes and Je-yun's plan, Yul makes good on his promise to I-seo.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A prince is the victim of an attempted assassination. He falls off a cliff and subsequently wanders for 100 days under a new name and personality. During that time he meets the head of a prominent detective agency.
